title: SOSHULIZM IS DEADLY! Dog-Faced Pony Soldier? 2.11.20
itunes:title: SOSHULIZM IS DEADLY! Dog-Faced Pony Soldier? 2.11.20
description:
In episode 567, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Tiff Stevenson to discuss Joe Biden's reaction to a question about electability, the mainstream media claiming Trump had a good week, Chris Matthew's absurd fear of socialism, Oscar's coverage, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Joe Biden just called his own supporter a Lying Horse-Faced Pony Soldier during a Town Hall in New Hampshire! 
  2. 8 very good things that happened to Donald Trump this week
  3. Here's the video of the moment... It really is something
  4. WATCH: Oscars 2020: Winners, speech highlights from the Academy Awards
  5. Joaquin Phoenix's Oscars speech in full: 'We feel entitled to artificially inseminate a cow and steal her baby'
  6. We don’t talk enough about animal suffering. That’s why Joaquin Phoenix’s Oscars speech matters.
  7. “I Fucking Love My Life”: Joaquin Phoenix on Joker, Why River Is His Rosebud, His Rooney Research, and His “Prenatal” Gift for Dark Characters
  8. Why Don’t We Talk About Joaquin Phoenix When We Talk About Casey Affleck?
  9. WATCH: Twistclip Loop - Hudson Mohawke

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
